pages.text: 蒸汽機器需要蒸汽來運轉，而鍋爐就能提供蒸汽。$(br2)鍋爐會緩慢消耗燃料來加熱。溫度足夠時，鍋爐就會產出蒸汽。別忘了加水，否則你的燃料就白燒了。
雖然鍋爐的造價高昂，但別忘了你可以獲得雙倍的礦。而且，一旦你有了頭兩台機器，它的造價就會降低三倍！
It probably looks crazy expensive to you right now, but don't forget that you can double ores. Also, as soon as you will have your first two machines, it will become three times less expensive!

To make fire clay bricks, you will need to cook fire clay dusts and in order to craft these, you will need brick dusts. To make some, hammer bricks (the item, not the block), in the Forge Hammer. The process efficiency can be improved in steam machines.
